column4: How does one add a pre existing windows XP to Grub from the grub commandline?
add something like whats on this pastebin to your menu.lst  http://pastebin.com/mb7d6022

Bazhang: this install of ubuntu is older ... on a drive that wasn't used .. it has the MBR on it .. and the drive we just pulled out had the previous windows MBR on it ..so i have a full windows drive without a MBR i just need to add it to the grub so i can boot into it..
